verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you <S%H1004>this<s%>, O house of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, which are <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and are come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but not in <S%H571>truth<s%>, nor in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

For they <S%H7121>call<s%> themselves of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H5564>stay<s%> themselves upon the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.

I have <S%H5046>declared<s%> the former <S%H7223>things<s%> from the <S%H227>beginning<s%>; and they went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and I <S%H8085>showed<s%> <S%H6213>them<s%>; I did them <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>, and they came to <S%H935>pass<s%>.
Because I <S%H1847>knew<s%> that you are <S%H7186>obstinate<s%>, and your <S%H6203>neck<s%> is an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H1517>sinew<s%>, and your <S%H4696>brow<s%> <S%H5154>brass<s%>;

I have even from the <S%H227>beginning<s%> <S%H5046>declared<s%> it to to <S%H935>you<s%>; before it came to pass I <S%H8085>showed<s%> it to <S%H559>you<s%>: lest you should say, My <S%H6090>idol<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6459>them<s%>, and my engraved image, and my molten <S%H5262>image<s%>, has commanded <S%H6680>them<s%>.

You have <S%H8085>heard<s%>, <S%H2372>see<s%> all <S%H5046>this<s%>; and will not you declare <S%H8085>it<s%>? I have shown you new <S%H2319>things<s%> from this <S%H6258>time<s%>, even hidden <S%H5341>things<s%>, and you did not know <S%H3045>them<s%>.

They are <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H6440>now<s%>, and not from the beginning; even before the <S%H3117>day<s%> when you <S%H8085>heard<s%> them <S%H559>not<s%>; lest you should say, <S%H3045>Behold<s%>, I knew them.

<S%H8085>Yes<s%>, you heard <S%H3045>not<s%>; Yes, you knew <S%H241>not<s%>; Yes, from that time that your ear was not <S%H6605>opened<s%>: for I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that you would deal <S%H898>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and were <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H6586>transgressor<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%>.
For my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake will I <S%H748>defer<s%> my <S%H639>anger<s%>, and for my <S%H8416>praise<s%> will I <S%H2413>refrain<s%> for <S%H3772>you<s%>, that I cut you not off.
<S%H6884>Behold<s%>, I have refined <S%H3701>you<s%>, but not with silver; I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> you in the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.
For my own <S%H6213>sake<s%>, even for my own sake, will I do <S%H2490>it<s%>: for how should my name be polluted? and I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> unto <S%H312>another<s%>.
<S%H8085>Listen<s%> unto <S%H3290>me<s%>, O Jacob and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, my <S%H7121>called<s%>; I am <S%H7223>he<s%>; I am the first, I also am the <S%H314>last<s%>.

My <S%H3027>hand<s%> also has laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and my right <S%H3225>hand<s%> has <S%H2946>spanned<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>: when I <S%H7121>call<s%> unto <S%H5975>them<s%>, they stand up <S%H3162>together<s%>.

All <S%H6908>you<s%>, assemble <S%H8085>yourselves<s%>, and hear; which among them has <S%H5046>declared<s%> these <S%H3068>things<s%>? The Lord has <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H6213>him<s%>: he will do his <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> on <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and his <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be on the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>.
<S%H1696>I<s%>, even I, have spoken; <S%H7121>Yes<s%>, I have called <S%H935>him<s%>: I have brought <S%H1870>him<s%>, and he shall make his way <S%H6743>prosperous<s%>.

<S%H7126>Come<s%> you <S%H7126>near<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, hear you <S%H1696>this<s%>; I have not spoken in <S%H5643>secret<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%>; from the <S%H6256>time<s%> that it <S%H136>was<s%>, there am I: and now the Lord <S%H3069>God<s%>, and his <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>, has sent <S%H7971>me<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, your <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which <S%H3925>teaches<s%> you to <S%H3276>profit<s%>, which <S%H1869>leads<s%> you by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that you should <S%H3212>go<s%>.

O <S%H3863>that<s%> you had <S%H7181>listened<s%> to my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>! then had your <S%H7965>peace<s%> been as a <S%H5104>river<s%>, and your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H1530>waves<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>:

Your <S%H2233>seed<s%> also had been as the <S%H2344>sand<s%>, and the <S%H6631>offspring<s%> of your <S%H4578>bowels<s%> like the <S%H4579>gravel<s%> <S%H8034>there<s%>; his name should not have been cut <S%H3772>off<s%> nor <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from before <S%H6440>me<s%>.

Go you <S%H3318>forth<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H1272>flee<s%> you from the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, with a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>singing<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H8085>you<s%>, tell <S%H3318>this<s%>, utter it even to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>, The Lord has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And they <S%H6770>thirsted<s%> not when he <S%H3212>led<s%> them through the <S%H2723>deserts<s%>: he caused the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H5140>flow<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> for <S%H1234>them<s%>: he split the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H4325>also<s%>, and the waters gushed <S%H2100>out<s%>.
There is no <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
